CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function does not escape the attributes (attrsMap) before inserting them into the HTML. This could lead to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) if the attributes contain malicious scripts. XSS allows attackers to execute scripts in the victim's browser which can hijack user sessions, deface web sites, or redirect the user to malicious sites.
